title: ERROR 004
body:
WHAT IS THIS ERROR I CAN'T PATCH AM USING THE NEW CLINT AND IT IS NOT UPDATING TO THE NEW PATCHH...........I DON'T KNOW WHAT IS WRONG IS IT FROM ME OR FROM YOU???
WHAT I THINK THE PROBLEM IS THAT THE NEW PATCHH NEEDS A BETTER PC TO HANDLE THE GAME MAYBE AM NOT SURE.I need help please.

replies.body: Same here I was trying to fix it in last hour but there is no posible way to do it. Can someone please help !
Hey man did you ever end up finding a way to fix this patch error? I have it too now and have tried multiple different things and i can't seem to get past it

The *004 Error* indicates that your connection to the patching servers is *unstable*. This often happens as a result of conflicting network settings, so I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure yours are all compatible with League.

Please let me know if this caused any noticeable change.
